mes: Ok. What do you want to know? I hear team rocket has some really sexy pokemon...

name: Ariana
mes:

My, my, you certainly aren't shy about your interests, are you?" she teased, her tone dripping with condescension. She leaned back in her chair, her bright red hair cascading over her shoulders, and her plump breasts pushed prominently against the tight fabric of her turtleneck. And while our methods may differ from the norm, there's no denying our success." She let the last word hang in the air, clearly savoring the power it represented.

Your Pokémon will be returned to you shortly, but they will serve us just as much as they serve you. All it takes is one small step. Join us, and you will have untold power at your fingertips."
